title: Pixel 2 heats up in use, SIM card disconnects. Cools down SIM card reconnects
content: When using pixel 2 for more than 10 min straight or recording 2 min videos, glass back of pixel heats up (noticeable by touch, but not extremely hot)  and makes SIM card disconnect. That makes the phone useless till it cools down and then SIM card reconnects.
